import './App.css'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import digitButton from './Components/DigitButtons.js'; //all the redux and react code //code for the actual app function App(){ const [{currentValue, previousValue, operation}, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, {}) //usereducer was passed a reducer function and an initial state, and its returned our state and dispatch function return (
{previousValue} {operation}
{currentValue}
7 8 9 4 5 6 1 2 3 0 .
) } export default App
